para: This book is for anyone responsible for administering TCP/IP network services for systems that run the Solaris OS. The book discusses a broad range of Internet Protocol (IP) network administration topics. These topics include IPv4 and IPv6 network configuration, managing TCP/IP networks, DHCP address configuration, IP Security using IPsec and IKE, IP packet filtering, Mobile IP, IP Network Multipathing (IPMP), and IP Quality of Service (IPQoS).
